en.change_info: The address will be used as the instance which in the subnet's default gateway.
en.dis_router: Do you want to disconnect this subnet from the router?
en.gw_tip: Optional. System will generate automaticlly. The address will be used as the instance which in the subnet's default gateway.
en.join_network_tip: Adding more than one network may lead to routing problems which will cause poor external networks connetions, please proceed with caution.
en.msg_disconnect_inst: Do you want to disconnect server ?

zh-CN.change_info: 这个地址可以被用于该私有网络内其他主机的缺省网关。
zh-CN.dis_router: 是否断开子网与路由器之间的连接？
zh-CN.gw_tip: 如不填，系统将自动生成。这个地址可以被用于该私有网络内其他主机的缺省网关。
zh-CN.join_network_tip: 加入多个网络可能会引发云主机路由问题而导致连不上外网，请谨慎操作。
